statements: SELECT * FROM savings_report;
SELECT customer_id, savings_amount FROM savings_report WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, savings_date FROM savings_report ORDER BY savings_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings_report WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(savings_amount) AS total_savings FROM savings_report GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM savings_report WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY savings_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(savings_amount) AS total_savings FROM savings_report GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_savings > 5000;
SELECT * FROM savings_report WHERE savings_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(savings_amount) AS avg_savings FROM savings_report;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(savings_amount) AS highest_savings FROM savings_report GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY highest_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, savings_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN savings s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, savings_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN savings ON customers.customer_id = savings.customer_id WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(savings_amount) AS total_savings FROM customers LEFT JOIN savings ON customers.customer_id = savings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_savings > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(customer_age) AS avg_age FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING avg_age < 40;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, saved_amount, saved_date FROM savings WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, saved_amount, saved_date FROM customers INNER JOIN savings ON customers.customer_id = savings.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, saved_amount FROM customers JOIN savings ON customers.customer_id = savings.customer_id WHERE saved_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(saved_amount) AS avg_saved_amount FROM customers JOIN savings ON customers.customer_id = savings.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY avg_saved_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, total_savings FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, total_savings FROM customers JOIN savings_report ON customers.customer_id = savings_report.customer_id WHERE savings_report.total_savings > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_savings FROM customers ORDER BY total_savings DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT quarter_name, SUM(total_savings) FROM quarters JOIN savings_report ON quarters.quarter_id = savings_report.quarter_id GROUP BY quarter_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE joining_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT saving_amount, saving_date FROM savings WHERE saving_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, saving_amount FROM customer_savings WHERE quarter_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM report WHERE total_savings < 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, joining_date FROM customers ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, saving_amount, saving_date FROM savings JOIN customer_savings ON savings.customer_id = customer_savings.customer_id;
SELECT quarter_name, sum(total_savings) as total_savings FROM customer_savings JOIN quarters ON customer_savings.quarter_id = quarters.quarter_id GROUP BY quarter_name;

SELECT customers.customer_name, quarters.quarter_name, total_savings FROM report JOIN customers ON report.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN quarters ON report.quarter_id = quarters.quarter_id ORDER BY total_savings DESC;
